name: The Love Letter
description:
Jenny had an excellent time at the office Valentine's day party, so good she cannot remember anything about it the next day. But a niggling feeling in her gut tells her, she did something and her day is going to turn bad.

Help Jenny to find out what happened at the party.

HOW TO PLAY?

MOVEMENT - WASD

RUN  - LEFT SHIFT

ACTION - E

PAUSE MENU - P

CREDITS:

Thank you to all the artists who creates free goodies on the Unity Asset Store for us game jammers to use.

Thank you to Alexander Nakarada for his wonderful music.

TO THE PLAYER...

Enjoy the game!

Lots of love and a happy Valentine's day (14 February 2021)!

Rona Hattingh
